### 依赖

<!--

把 gradle.build 里面的依赖部分代码贴出来

示例：

```gradle
dependencies {
    compile fileTree(dir: 'libs', include: ['*.jar'])
    compile 'com.android.support:appcompat-v7:24.2.1'
    compile 'io.reactivex:rxjava:1.1.10'
    compile 'io.reactivex:rxandroid:1.2.1'
}
```
